title: Thunderbird stopped working and I cannot enter it at all to make amendments
content:
After receiving several spoof emails trying to tell me that Sky Yahoo was ceasing, Thunderbird is now useless. I deleted every spoof email, without actioning them. I am unable to even get into Settings, as I get a buffering indication. The latest genuine email I received was on 17th July. I get headings along the top of Thunderbird, which are just buffering. I have uninstalled the program and reinstalled a genuine copy from the Thunderbird website and it STILL shows the same problem. I include a screenshot to demonstrate the problem.

Best regards, Robin Pearn, friary@sky.com
creator: friary861

title: thunderbird folder properties/compact won't launch
content:
Hi !

I'm running Thunderbird 129 (beta) on Win10. Long time user & fan of TB...

Currently, right-clicking on Properties or Compact for any folder won't launch/start anything in my TB. Any clue ? Many thanks !

Bit of context: . I'm running numerous accounts and folders; . here, I wanted to compact some folders to bring some hygiene to my mail boxes; . I've been running huge Inboxes (10ks of emails, Inbox file of several GBs... I know, this is BAD ! sorry...) . some of my folders are starting to show corruption symptoms (dates 1970, rubbish text in preview, nstmp folders...) . my TB is parametered to compact when 200MB are saved (though I doubt it actually does) . I used to have msgs requiring me to compact folders, but don't seem to have them any more (maybe the system got tired with my ignoring it ;)

I have read different threads about Compacting (Complications, workaround, Compacting folders...) and folders, but didn't found any solution/workaround. note: I haven't seen any post reporting this specific issue (right-click menu opens, but functionnalities there -such as Properties or Compact- seem inactive or somehow dis-activated).

I tried disactivating any download, and moved huge nstmp files out of the TB folders (trying to make them somewhat lighter).

Many thanks for your help !
creator: utestit

title: I definitely followed https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/automatic-conversion-google-mail-accounts-oauth20

title: Cannot preview Outlook Inbox message content
content:
Starting this morning ,when I open Thunderbird and download folders from "Outlook Inbox" I cannot view the content in preview mode. Instead of showing the contents, there is the following text; 

 ----boundary_75e27897dff0419baf014a41bcb9dc32--

Also, when viewing the message source for any of the messages in the "Inbox" there is a large amount of garbage and all messages have the same garbage. Every message begins with the following 2 lines of text;

2ppeVJ1YkJYaWk2dyZh bXA7ZGF0YT0wNCU3QzAxJTdDJTdDNDc4ZWFmODgwNzE4NDhlY2VjMWQwOGQ5ZTY5MzZmYTMlN0M4

All other folders function properly and when choosing a message the preview pane displays the contents.

I am using the latest version of Thunderbird; 128.0.1esr (54-bit)

Thanks in advance for your help!
creator: rlustersr

title: safely reducing the size of my Thunderbird folder
content: The size of the Thunderbird folder on my Windows 7 PC [C:\Users\ronbar\AppData\Roaming\Thunderbird] increases daily. A side effect of this is to increase the size of my daily backup application. I have found if/after I update Thunderbird to its current version, the size of the Thunderbird folder is reduced.. Is there any way to safely reduce the size of my Thunderbird folder [e.g. by deleting files or folders in the Thunderbird folder] without needing to update Thunderbird? If yes, then please advise how to do that. Thank you, Ron [ronbar@gmail.com]
creator: ronbar59
